name: Gmail - display keyboard shortcuts
description:
This style displays keyboard shortcuts for old and new version of Gmail.
About shortcuts, visit Gmail Help Center.(http://mail.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=6594&topic=1547)

discussions.name: Nice idea, very usefull, but I added a space befor
